00003 namespace Sass {

00005   string Base64VLQ::encode(const int number) const
00006   {
00007     string encoded = "";
00008 
00009     int vlq = to_vlq_signed(number);
00010 
00011     do {
00012       int digit = vlq & VLQ_BASE_MASK;
00013       vlq >>= VLQ_BASE_SHIFT;
00014       if (vlq > 0) {
00015         digit |= VLQ_CONTINUATION_BIT;
00016       }
00017       encoded += base64_encode(digit);
00018     } while (vlq > 0);
00019 
00020     return encoded;
00021   }
00022 
00023   char Base64VLQ::base64_encode(const int number) const
00024   {
00025     int index = number;
00026     if (index < 0) index = 0;
00027     if (index > 63) index = 63;
00028     return CHARACTERS[index];
00029   }
00030 
00031   int Base64VLQ::to_vlq_signed(const int number) const
00032   {
00033     return (number < 0) ? ((-number) << 1) + 1 : (number << 1) + 0;
00034   }
00035 
00036   const char* Base64VLQ::CHARACTERS = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
00037 
00038   const int Base64VLQ::VLQ_BASE_SHIFT = 5;
00039   const int Base64VLQ::VLQ_BASE = 1 << VLQ_BASE_SHIFT;
00040   const int Base64VLQ::VLQ_BASE_MASK = VLQ_BASE - 1;
00041   const int Base64VLQ::VLQ_CONTINUATION_BIT = VLQ_BASE;
